string.name: photography
string.br: \n This app provides various kind of photography to you , You can get the deatils of the phography and photographers through this application , you can hire them or their previous works,price and package will be different based the time and the type of photograpy you choose , if you cant contact them you can send a mail to us on serveu@gmail.com, we will make sure they gonna call you within 24 hours from your mail. \n
\n You can search the service through the keyletters \n
\n Photographer - PY ( they provide all kind of photography ) \n

string.name: video
string.br: \n You can hire videographers through this application , there are different types of making video you can choose them based on your requirement price and package will be based on it .if you cant contact them you can send a mail to us on serveu@gmail.com, we will make sure they gonna call you within 24 hours from your mail . \n
\n You can search the service through the keyletters \n
\n Small Scale Videograpy - SSV(birthday party , 25th wedding , home ceremony , showroom / office opening ) \n
\n Flim Videography - FV (short flim , commercial video , product video ) \n
